sentences.english: Officers with dogs then began to patrol the area.
sentences.chinese: 牽警犬的警察隨後開始在這一地區巡邏。

sentences.english: Police dog guards the peace of the Yuzhno-Kurilsk citizens.
sentences.chinese: 警犬守護着南庫里爾斯克市民的安全。

sentences.english: Scott led by people with a pony and Amundsen led equipped with the dogs and ski.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特率領的人與小馬和亞孟森領導配備警犬和滑雪。

sentences.english: I have a friend who has a large police dog called Jack.
sentences.chinese: 我有個朋友，他有隻叫做傑克的大警犬。

sentences.english: This week I had a guard dog with me patrolling the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 這周有一隻警犬和我一起巡邏。

sentences.english: The Executive Board determines the number of participants for both local and international dog handlers.
sentences.chinese: 執行局決定參加本地及國際警犬數量。

sentences.english: Gallagher had never told his boss why he'd left the canine division.
sentences.chinese: 加拉赫從未告訴上司自己離開警犬組的原因。

sentences.english: They can bite much more effective then even German ship (police) dogs.
sentences.chinese: 它們的咬傷力也比德國警犬強。

sentences.english: The police dog sniffed the crime scene for clues.
sentences.chinese: 警犬在犯罪現場聞來聞去尋找線索。

sentences.english: With the dogs leading, the police began to search for the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 有警犬在後面領路，警察動手搜求罪犯。

sentences.english: New York has followed the example of Paris in establishing a brigade of police-dogs.
sentences.chinese: 紐約已效仿巴黎的做法建立了一支警犬隊。

sentences.english: Police dogs are often very intelligent.
And in the background, but getting closer, I could hear the baying of bloodhounds.
sentences.chinese: 而在身後，我可以聽到警犬的吠聲越來越近。

sentences.english: The police used dogs to sniff out the criminals in their hiding - place.
sentences.chinese: 警察使用警犬查出了罪犯的藏身地點。

sentences.english: The hounds and the men hunting him had gathered between the homestead and the iron gate.
sentences.chinese: 警犬和追蹤他的人聚集在宅基地和大鐵門中間。

sentences.english: The drugs were snuffled in a bag by a police dog.
sentences.chinese: 這些毒品是警犬在嗅一個提包時找到的。

definition: SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
Tibetan mastiff/also called 西藏獒犬
